title: Decorator Wall Light Paddle Switch With Wallplates, 15 Amp Single Pole On/Off, Self-grounding, Rocker Replacement for Light & Ceiling Fan, Light Almond, 10 Pack

product_information.Included Components: 10 x Light Switch with Wall Plate, Installation Instruction
product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #109,301 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)   #352 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Single Pole Light Switch, Rating 15A 120/277V, Decora Screwless Wall Plates Included, Light Almond Finish
Decorative wall switch using premium-grade polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel, ensuring exceptional durability and prolonged usage
Featuring a green grounding screw and self-grounding clip, these wall switch automatically establish grounding within the junction box, offering added protection against electrical shocks

Electrical light switch provide both quick push-in wiring and side wiring. Terminal screws accept up to 12AWG and quick push-in wiring accepts 14AWG solid copper wire only. Installation is a breeze with break-off plaster ears and a narrow switch body
Ideal for residential applications and most commercial settings requiring single pole switch. Perfect for upgrading or replacing worn-out rocker switches in bedrooms, kitchens, or workspaces
We offer 1 year replacement guarantee for paddle decora switch(Non-human damage). If you have any questions about the product, please contact us, we will reply you within 24 hours

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Good price for simple light switches.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy to install, look nice
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: So far these switches have worked great. They were easy to install in my son’s room!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Perfect, everyone commend me. It gives the light fixtures a more awesome look.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I have had 4 switches break. Were only installed two weeks before the middle switch fell out of place

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This are best bang for your buck

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsA Switch That Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Sometimes, simplicity is the best upgrade. These light switches are easy to install—no need to call an electrician or panic about wires. The glossy white finish gives a clean, modern look to any room. They fit into standard boxes and come with wall plates, so no extra shopping required. Plus, the self-grounding feature is a nice touch for peace of mind.That said, they’re not exactly revolutionary. It’s a switch, it works, and that's about it. But for the price, it does what it’s supposed to do, and I can't really ask for more than that. Perfect for replacing outdated switches or giving your room a small facelift without breaking the bank.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The quality was okay they feel a little cheap for the price but I ordered matte black and they sent me gloss

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are exactly as described. They look nice, are easy to install, and function as they should. It does make a loud click when using which is annoying especially if you’re trying not to make noise in the house.
